summary: Unit test module that validates edgewise message‑passing primitives in the PyTorch backend of a graph neural network library, covering operations that propagate node attributes to edges, compute edgewise dot products, and apply binary functions between source and destination node features on both homogeneous and heterogeneous graphs.
business_intent: Guarantee the correctness and robustness of low‑level edgewise operations used in graph neural network models, ensuring they work across different identifier types and graph heterogeneity before deployment in production workloads.
